providerName.description: Name of the person or organization who owns the portfolio.

tags.description: Tags to apply to the connection. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
